Welcome to PublicLiability.ie - the site for professionals, consultants and tutors seeking Public Liability insurance.

 

Throughout our years in the Insurance Broking business, we have seen that many small consultancies, tutors / teachers and professionals have difficulty arranging simple Public Liability insurance to cover their liability to members of the public arising from their occupation. 

Buyers want Quick, Instant , Low cost Public Liability insurance for their business.

 

We have partnered with WR Berkley Insurance Group to provide the solution to the above.

PublicLiability.ie enables you to buy Liability Insurance at  Low Cost and in an Instant and with a quality insurance company.

 

If you need Public Liability  insurance cover, then look no further - your Public Liability insurance search is over!  Click HERE for an insurance quote

 

In addition for those that require same, we can offer Professional Indemnity insurance - the cover you need to protect your clients from your negligence, oversight or incorrect advice. Previously only available at high minimum premiums - If you are interested in this cover please follow the link to our

Professional Indemnity Insurance site

 

You can have your Public Liability insurance arranged within minutes  – click on the Quote button below to find out how! Please remember we can also quote for other commercial business, not only the ones listed.

About Us

This site is managed by Burke Insurances Ltd who are established since 1965. We have been specialising in many forms of insurance, including Public Liability insurance, for a number of years. For more information about our firm and links to the main Burke Insurances site, please visit the About Us section.
